rules_text:
Rhapsody {5}{R}{W} [i](Pay {5}{R}{W} to cast this as a 4/4, or as a sorcery to make it become a 4/4.)[/i]
Whenever a creature you control with power 4 or greater attacks, look at the top four cards of your library. You may cast a nonland card with mana value 3 or less from among them without paying its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
flavor_text: [i]“Hell or glory, I don't want anything in between.”[/i]
notes: She's My Winona — Fall Out Boy
